overview: Hunkering down in the trenches of suburban America, he protects a distracted public from a terrible evil- one that is festering right underneath our noses, in our neighborhoods, and all around us: Vampires. Or so he believes. Meet Hank- a self-righteous crusader who brings up the question: is he protecting us, or do we need protection from him?
tagline: He's making the world a safer place.
title: Vampire Hunter Hank
